Type.Name: IWrapper

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWrapper

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Interface to identify a handle accessible wrapped type.
Docs.remarks: This interface is used by the code generator, but it not typically used by application code.

Docs.summary: A pointer to the native type instance.
